_meta.description: Event Payload for AWS Lambda Function

parameters.name: The name of the user, used for a personalized greeting.
parameters.number: A numerical value that will be doubled as part of the function's logic.

_meta.usage: Invoke with AWS CLI using: aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 lambda invoke --function-name myLambdaFunction --payload file://event.json output.txt
